name: Trevor West Knapp
bio: Trevor West Knapp took her undergraduate degree at Princeton, an M.F.A. at Cornell, and an M.A. at Brown. Winner of an Academy of American Poets Prize at Cornell, she has been a finalist for the Yale Series of Younger Poets Prize and the Walt Whitman Award. Her poems have appeared widely in literary journals including Poetry Northwest, North Dakota Quarterly, and The Kenyon Review.
